ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 1024
ygData.msgSnippet: I think Enchanters have a certain personality type that doesn t mix with ANYONE (i.e. arrogant as hell~) Ok, not all of em :P Hally, 52, 53, 52, 53, 52, 53,
ygData.messageBody:
I think Enchanters have a certain personality type that doesn't mix with
ANYONE (i.e. arrogant as hell~)

Ok, not all of em :P

Hally, 52, 53, 52, 53, 52, 53, 52, 53 shaman (can't decide if i wanna kill a
dragon or not!)
(oh and btw, when you use a pet and don't root mobs, its a Bad Thing)
Tani, 26th Bard
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: K. Bruce [mailto:lady_ark@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:32 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1024
>
>
>
> >what level are you? i don't think i was ever at a level
> where i didn't want an
> >enchanter in the group except when i was soloing thru level 5.
>
>
> my first real partner and the person who i started playing
> because of was
> great as a warrior. we did awesome. then we both started new
> chars bard/enc.
> i nearly quit playing eq, lost him as a friend, and ya. what
> a horrible time
> that was. i avoid them now, since following experiences with
> encs and i just
> don't mix. imho, i think enc's have a certain personality
> type that just
> don't mix with bards. hehe
>
> lynnara starspinner
